column4: hey all, got a fairly specific question.  will the fujitsu scan snap s300 work out of the box with ubuntu?  if so, what app will work with it???
hey all, got a fairly specific question.  will the fujitsu scan snap s300 work out of the box with ubuntu 7.10?  if so, what app will work with it???
http://www.sane-project.org/sane-mfgs.html#Z-FUJITSU search that page for "s300" and you'll see, yes.
hey thanks for the link checking it out now, didnt come across it in my search so far.
